fields.title: Brickbottom neighborhood squeezed by Greenline
fields.copy_rendered:
If you look at Somerville's Brickbottom neighborhood from above, you'll see a tangled spaghetti bowl of train tracks.

And it's only going to get more complicated with the Green Line extension: new tracks, a maintenance facility, and possibly more commuter rail traffic.
fields.copy:
If you look at Somerville's Brickbottom neighborhood from above, you'll see a tangled spaghetti bowl of train tracks. 

And it's only going to get more complicated with the Green Line extension: new tracks, a maintenance facility, and possibly more commuter rail traffic.

fields.title: Sound barriers on the Green Line
fields.copy_rendered:
Transportation Secretary Jeff Mullan today is there and records video as the MBTA begins clearing the Mattapan High Speed Line with a jet blower following the December 26-27 winter storm.

The jet blower shortens the process of clearing and leaves traditional equipment available for other snow clearing duties. A noisy but highly effective strategy.
